embed: <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="http://youtube.com/v/i-dZ2pxJNFM?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://youtube.com/v/i-dZ2pxJNFM?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="390" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
summary:
Did you know that you could contribute to Python? From documentation

work to patch reviews to new features to blogging, there are a number of

ways you can give back to Python. This talk for beginners will walk you

through these ways with concrete demonstrations.
title: How you can contribute to Python
